article: Never before had I imagined I should have the opportunity to live with so many girls.Would they  _  such a single "Hi" from me? I was about to greet my new roommates,  _  they did not seem to have the same  _  attention that I had.They just dealt with their own  _  , sorting out their clothes,and making arrangements for their university life.Thus tranquility became the  _  atmosphere in the dormitory. To my surprise,  _  such a situation,I did not feel a sense of  _  .With time going on,we got to know each other deeper.I was  _  o find that in deep soul we all had great dreams and belonged to the same  _  . However,not long before the  _  was disturbed by my own upset of mind for study pressure.What I was  _  about seemed to have  _  o do with them and what they were doing and talking about seemed so far away from me.However,one incident changed my  _  and made me treasure this kind of  _  better and more confident in our friendship. One day,when I was leaving the teachers' office,it was in complete silence and frightening  _  .At my dormitory gate,I was startled to find there still  _  a little light glimmering in the darkness,so faint but yet so clear.Just under the  _  of the light,I went to the room without any difficulty.They were in sound sleep,leaving the  _  ight on in the calm world.Tears rolled down my cheeks. I know  at last  that we all like tranquility,both in environment and in our mind.It is the care that  _  all the misunderstandings and unpleasantness.
